Data Processor¶

A module for processing data for time series prediction using neural networks.

Dependencies:

torch pandas sklearn

Classes:

DataProcessor: A class for loading and processing data for time series prediction.

class utils.data_processor.DataProcessor(train_file, test_file, delta, device)¶

Bases: object

A class for loading and processing data for time series prediction.

Parameters

  • train_file (str) – The file path for the training data.

  • test_file (str) – The file path for the testing data.

  • delta (int) – The time step for the input sequence.

  • device (str) – The device to use for computation (e.g., ‘cpu’, ‘cuda’).

train_file¶

The file path for the training data.

Type

str

test_file¶

The file path for the testing data.

Type

str

delta¶

The time step for the input sequence.

Type

int

scaler¶

The scaler for normalizing the data.

Type

sklearn.preprocessing.MinMaxScaler

train_data¶

The normalized training data.

Type

numpy.ndarray

test_data¶

The normalized testing data.

Type

numpy.ndarray

create_inout_sequences()¶

Create input-output sequences for training.

Returns

A list of tuples of input and output sequences.

Return type

List[Tuple[torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor]]

get_test_data()¶

Get the normalized testing data as a PyTorch tensor.

Returns

The normalized testing data.

Return type

torch.Tensor

get_train_data()¶

Get the normalized training data as a flattened PyTorch tensor.

Returns

The normalized training data.

Return type

torch.Tensor

load_data()¶

Load and normalize the training and testing data.
